Italian Deli and Market has won the TripAdvisor Travelers’ Choice
(previously Certificate of Excellence)
year after year!
The Italian Deli and Market has been family owned and operated since 1997! We serve the best Italian sandwiches, dinners, salads, soups, and pizza to the locals and visitors of Marco Island. We have a fine selection of domestic and imported meats, cheeses, grocery items, and homemade “Heat & Eat” prepared foods. We also cater for any style of event.
• Dine In
• Take Out
• Full Bar
• Live Music
• Heat and Eat Prepared Foods
• Grocery Items
• Custom Catering
OPEN DAILY!
Our hours of operation are 11am-9pm Sunday – Thursday,
11am-10pm Friday and Saturday.
Happy Hour daily from 2pm-6pm!
Live music Tuesday through Sunday from 6-9pm!
Karaoke Monday from 6-9pm!
Visit us at 902 Park Ave or call us at (239) 394-9493!
Please let us know if there’s anything we can do to serve you better!
We pride ourselves on our delicious food and service. We love being Marco Island’s home for all of your favorites. For dine in, take out, delivery, or catering, we are here to provide personalized service and excellent Italian food and products to all our customers.
